channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #88 – Reward Customers and Take Payments In Your Apps

item.title: By: Gremlin Interactive
item.dc:creator: Gremlin Interactive
item.description:
Hey Dave, yes I am that same Danny. However (and this is important), I have since left Coronalabs before venturing into these plugins. So currently, I only work for my own company (Gremlin Interactive).
We were always huge fans of the company you listed on the wiki, and are trying to bring back it's great name, and proud history.
Hope this answers your questions.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Dave, yes I am that same Danny. However (and this is important), I have since left Coronalabs before venturing into these plugins. So currently, I only work for my own company (Gremlin Interactive).

We were always huge fans of the company you listed on the wiki, and are trying to bring back it’s great name, and proud history.

Hope this answers your questions.

item.title: By: Dave Baxter
item.dc:creator: Dave Baxter
item.description:
Like the Kiip thing but can't see any prices on the Kiip website, how do they make money ?
Also is Danny the Corona Staff Danny ?
Thought I recognised the company name (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gremlin_Interactive), sadly not the same company.
Dave
item.content:encoded:
Like the Kiip thing but can’t see any prices on the Kiip website, how do they make money ?
